name: FINDING_IMAGE_CAPTION
description: This table contains generated image captions used for images linked to a procedure finding.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FINDING_IMAGE_CAPTION
columns.description: The image caption text that is associated with a particular finding
